about_the_game:
In collaboration with the publishing house BILDNER Verlag, we present "The Official Guides" for Railway Empire 2.

The Engine Catalogue contains all 60 locomotives of the game with their most important data such as speed, price, train performance and much more. You also learn about the historical background and data of the individual trains and can thus dive deep into railway history. In addition, there are explanations and tips on how to replace and improve the trains in the course of the game.



You can find your Railway Empire 2 guide in your Steam Apps game folder: \steamapps\common\Railway Empire 2\guidebook

Or access this folder from the properties of the game in your library, choose "local files", then "browse".
